external_games.name: Mahjong Egyptian: The Mystery of the Pharaoh

name: Mahjong Egyptian: The Mystery of the Pharaoh
summary: The game Mahjong Egyptian: The Mystery of the Pharaoh is made in the style of the greatest ancient civilizations. When traveling from one Egyptian sight to the other, you open a new level. Relax and enjoy this beautiful game! Your task is to find pairs of not closed identical shields and remove them from the board.
